titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.
Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. McCarthy moved to refer to House Administration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on the McCarthy motion to refer H.Res. 355 to the Committee on House Administration.
The previous question on the motion to refer Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 185 (Roll No. 425).
On motion to refer Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 176 (Roll No. 426).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Requires the Speaker of the House of Representatives to: (1) remove any state flag containing any portion of the Confederate battle flag, other than a flag displayed by the office of a Member of the House, from any area within the House wing of the Capitol or any House office building; and (2) donate any such flag to the Library of Congress.
